actions.committee: Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs (Formerly:  Post Office and Civil Service).

official_title: A bill to authorize reduced postage rates for certain mail matter sent to Members of Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes all persons sending mail matter not exceeding four ounces to their Senators and Representatives to use a special one cent stamp issued for that purpose.

titles.title: A bill to authorize reduced postage rates for certain mail matter sent to Members of Congress.
